verbose_text: The patients who met the following criteria were placed in the fulminant type 1 diabetes group : 1) ketosis or ketoacidosis within a week after the onset of hyperglycemic symptoms; 2) plasma glucose levels> = 16 mmol/L and HbA 1c < 8.9% at the first visit, and 3) urinary C-peptide level < 10 mug / day, fasting serum C-peptide level < 0.3 ng/mL, or serum C-peptide < 0.5 ng/mL after glucagon or a meal load.
